title: Morning Joe 2/8/21
description: The impeachment trial of former President Donald Trump begins this week. House impeachment managers are planning a video-heavy presentation. Some GOP members are publicly disagreeing with the substance and process of impeachment.
author: news.podcasts@nbcuni.com (NBC News)
content:encoded: The impeachment trial of former President Donald Trump begins this week. House impeachment managers are planning a video-heavy presentation. Some GOP members are publicly disagreeing with the substance and process of impeachment.
